name: Wage Framework
description: Every hour, every member of the government gets a wage according to the index wage. The senate can adjust this index wage by changing the custom stat on the White-Tiger citizen. Wages are paid out of the personal wealth of the White-Tiger citizen so the Government has to make sure to keep this wealth stocked up. Owed wages are tracked. The starting index wage is 60$ per hour.

PeopleToSendTo.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Citizen</ecoicon>: The citizen who performed the interaction.

properties.Title: Owed Wages Check
properties.UserDescription: Wages that are not paid out are remembered and citizens can check how much wages the government owes them with the !wagesowed chat command

properties.Message: The Government owes you this much wages:

properties.Title: Senator Wage
properties.UserDescription: Senators receive 45% of the Index Wage. If they hold any title of the executive, they only get 22% of the Index Wage.
